Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY
REPORTED REFERRED TO WAYS AND MEANS

Votes.VoteType: Favorable refer to committee Ways and Means

Title: Relates to procurement requirements for end point device security
Summary: Directs that state agencies require that procurement of personal computing goods, services and solutions meet the National Institute of Standards and Technology (NIST) Cybersecurity Framework.
LawCode: Amd ยง165, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law, in relation to procurement requirements for end point device security
